info.description: This document describes the APIs to integrate with Inspectorioâ€™s SaaS system
info.title: API INTEGRATION

parameters.description: The username and password will be in JSON format. The password must be hashed with SHA512.
parameters.name: body

200.description: The token and refreshToken is returned. The token must be added to header to all other requests to server. The token will be expired in 24 hours. When the token is expired, the client can acquire a new token by using refresh token API that is described in the next section

refreshToken.description: The refreshToken returned in Login API

200.description: The new token and refresh-token is returned.

400.description: The refresh-token is not included in the request header

parameters.description: The number of items to return
parameters.name: limit

200.description: List of POs in JSON format

400.description: The token is not included in the request header

parameters.description: The whole data of PO in JSON format.
parameters.name: body

201.description: The content of PO in JSON format

409.description: The PO with same number already exists in the system

200.description: The content of PO in JSON format

get.description: Get information of a specific PO

parameters.description: The whole data of PO in JSON format.
parameters.name: body

200.description: The content of PO in JSON format

409.description: The PO with same number already exists in the system

put.description: Update information of an existing PO
